comments.body: That ratio is definitely way off. Weird. Have they made any significant changes to regex processing in the last few releases of .NET? 🤔

comments.author: ghost
comments.body:
I have been having problems with impersonation. There had been quite a bit of coding going on in Azure that I was unaware of. Also, I couldn't access or remove it. It's just me running my business and so... a little disturbing. I'm not certain but I'm seeing that wiki may be a coding point for these individuals. I'm not creating any more tokens or gaining any access for myself. I have to ride this one out, just like this Azure account finally expired, yet... lol, my computers, one laptop, one Dell desktop are down and I can't recover them myself. Good times. I have just had enough and I can not go this alone.  

Thank so much for doing what you do.

If no one tells you today, then let me be that person that tells you...

You are doing an AWESOME JOB 👌 



[Uploading Document.docx…]()
